rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall transitioning into a modern living room with large windows and traditional Chettinad-style arches for aesthetics, ensuring good Vastu alignment for social interactions.
Adjacent to the living area, designed with ample seating and an open-plan concept incorporating Chettinad motifs and light fixtures, aligning with Vastu principles for food blessings.

Fully equipped kitchen adheres to Indian building norms. The layout respects Vastu by placing the stove in the east or northeast direction, with sufficient ventilation and storage facilities including a pantry.
Adjacent to the dining area for ease of access. Designed following local plumbing codes and Vastu guidelines ensuring proper water flow in the household.
A modest yet comfortable room allocated for the domestic helpers, located near the kitchen area with a separate utility space to respect privacy and Vastu energy flow.

openings.description: A robust entrance door placed at the south side for inviting positive energy, following local norms with reinforced steel and traditional Chettinad motifs.
Spacious balconies attached to bedrooms ensuring natural light, proper ventilation, and a view of the garden, designed with Vastu considerations.

openings.description: Strategically placed windows to maximize sunlight and cross-ventilation in accordance with Vastu and Indian building norms.

rooms.description: A luxurious master bedroom featuring a large balcony facing the east for morning sunlight and Vastu harmony. Includes an ensuite bathroom.
Four spacious bedrooms each with individual balconies, ensuring privacy and abundant natural light. Bedrooms are arranged to maintain balance in the Vastu layout for a joint family.
A multi-purpose area for relaxation and study, designed with flexible furniture arrangements and ample storage space.
Provides convenient access to guests on the upper level. Designed following Vastu guidelines with water outlets in the north-east region.

openings.description: Each bedroom features a balcony to promote open space and natural light, adhering to both Chettinad aesthetics and Vastu principles.

rooms.description: A modern, elevated swimming pool area designed for family leisure and relaxation. Features a surrounding deck with seating areas and integrated landscaping.
Adjacent to the swimming pool, this area is designed as an extended outdoor living space for relaxation and social gatherings, respecting Vastu by ensuring unobstructed water flow.

openings.description: Skylights or open roof windows to allow natural light into the pool area and maintain energy balance as per Vastu.
